sense.name: 调查, investigation
sense.commentary: An investigation is to examine an event or situation or a crime carefullly.
sense.examples:
警察的调查将进行几个星期。 The police investigation will take weeks.
她们的调查报告模棱两可。 Their investigation report was full of ambiguities.
他对这作了社会调查. He did a social investigation about it.

sense.name: inquiry, 调查, 查询
sense.commentary: An inquiry is an attempt to discover the facts about something, or to ask for information.
sense.examples:
商行信用的调查 a credit inquiry
统计调查 a statistical inquiry
我对票价作了调查 I've made inquiries about the cost of a ticket.

sense.name: survey, 调查, 测量
sense.commentary: An survey is a collection of information gathered by asking many people the same questions, usually to find out how they live or their opinions about different things, or the activity of collecting such information.
sense.examples:
根据最近的一项调查,单上海就有250多万外来民工。 According to a recent survey, in Shanghai alone there are more than 2.5 million migrant workers.
地质调查 a geological survey
农村调查 rural survey

sense.name: 调查, questionnaire
sense.commentary: Aquestionnaire is a written list of questions that people are asked so tghat informjation can be collecxted.
sense.examples:
舆论调查 a questionnaire of public opinion
他准备了一份调查来获取情报. He prepared a questionnire to collect information
一份开分店的调查. a questionnaire about opening a brunch store.
